de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator

Interface Navigator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NavigatorImpl

    public interface Navigator
    Interface for executing a Task. Implementations are responsible to control the boat in such a way, that the task will be finished eventually.
    Author:
    hscheel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String MAX_BEAT_ANGLE_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the maximum angle of the wind towards the boat, which can not be reached by the boat directly.
      static java.lang.String MAX_LINE_ANGLE_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the minimum line distance for calculation.
      static java.lang.String MAX_LINE_DIST_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the maximum line distance for calculation.
      static java.lang.String MIN_BEAT_ANGLE_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the minimum angle of the wind towards the boat, which can not be reached by the boat directly.
      static java.lang.String WAIT_TIME_PROPERTY
      Name of the property defining the wait time between two navigation cycles.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doTask(Task task)
      Executes a Task.
